description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in nebelhorn Blappsta Mobile App Plugin & Your native, mobile iPhone App and Android App allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Blappsta Mobile App Plugin – Your native, mobile iPhone App and Android App: from n/a through 0.8.8.8.

product.name: Blappsta Mobile App Plugin – Your native, mobile iPhone App and Android App
